comment.text: The translation key "EnterAppCodeTitle" is used to display the title of a field asking users to enter their authentication app code. In the UI, it appears as part of a confirmation page for two-factor authentication (TFA), prompting users to input their authorization code from an external authentication app.

usage.context:
return ( <>
{t("EnterAppCodeTitle")} {t("EnterAppCodeDescription")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό από την εφαρμογή επαληθευτή' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό από την εφαρμογή ελέγχου' or 'Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό από την εφαρμογή πιστοποίησης'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εισαγάγετε τον κωδικό από την εφαρμογή ελέγχου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Մուտքագրեք կոդը իսկորոշման հավելվածից" is a literal translation that sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Մուտքագրեք լրացուցիչ հավելվածից ստացված կոդը" or "Մուտքագրեք ծառայության հավելվածից ստացված կոդը" or simply "Մուտքագրեք կոդը հավելվածից" depending on the specific context and desired level of formality.
The translation 'ໃສ່ລະຫັດຈາກແອັບເພື່ອຢືນຢັນ' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Enter code from authentication app' in a natural Lao way. It sounds overly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ້ອນລະຫັດຈາກແອັບຯຢັ້ງຢືນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ද්වි-සාධක යෙදුමෙන් කේතයක් යොදන්න" while conveying the general idea, is a bit literal and could be more natural in Sinhala. "ද්වි-සාධක" directly translates to "two-factor" which is not commonly used in everyday language in this context.  A more natural phrasing would be more focused on the app itself and its function.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like "අනුමැතිය ලබා දෙන යෙදුමෙන් කේතයක් යොදන්න" (Enter code from the authorization app) or "අනුමැති කේතය යොදන්න" (Enter authorization code).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Zadajte kód z aplikácie na overenie totožnosti' is overly verbose and formal for a user-facing label. A more natural and concise translation would be more user-friendly. The English 'Enter code from authentication app' is more straightforward.

The Slovenian translation "Vnesite kodo iz aplikacije avtentikacijo" is grammatically incorrect. The word 'avtentikacijo' is in the accusative case but doesn't fit the sentence structure. It should be in the genitive case or replaced with a more appropriate word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vnesite kodo iz aplikacije za avtentikacijo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'aplikacije avtentikacijo' attempts to convey 'authentication app', it's not the natural way to express it in Slovenian. 'Aplikacije za avtentikacijo' or 'avtentikacijske aplikacije' would be more accurate and idiomatic.
The translation 'Kimlik doğrulama uygulamasından kodu girin' is a literal translation that can sound awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Doğrulama uygulamasındaki kodu girin'.

The translation "输入身份验证应用中的代码" is technically correct but slightly less natural than other options. A more fluid translation might be '输入验证码' or '输入身份验证码'. '代码' (code) is too literal and not the standard way to refer to an authentication app code.
